cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.12)

project(handcrank-engine LANGUAGES CXX)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED True)

set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/build")

set(SDL_LIBRARY_DIR "/tmp/.sdl/SDL2-2.30.6/lib")
set(SDL_INCLUDE_DIR "/tmp/.sdl/SDL2-2.30.6/include/SDL2")

set(SDL_IMAGE_LIBRARY_DIR "/tmp/.sdl/SDL2_image-2.8.2/lib")
set(SDL_IMAGE_INCLUDE_DIR "/tmp/.sdl/SDL2_image-2.8.2/include/SDL2")

set(SDL_TTF_LIBRARY_DIR "/tmp/.sdl/SDL2_ttf-2.22.0/lib")
set(SDL_TTF_INCLUDE_DIR "/tmp/.sdl/SDL2_ttf-2.22.0/include/SDL2")

find_library(SDL2_LIBRARY NAMES SDL2 HINTS ${SDL_LIBRARY_DIR})
find_library(SDL2_IMAGE_LIBRARY NAMES SDL2_image HINTS ${SDL_IMAGE_LIBRARY_DIR})
find_library(SDL2_TTF_LIBRARY NAMES SDL2_ttf HINTS ${SDL_TTF_LIBRARY_DIR})

include_directories(
    ${SDL_INCLUDE_DIR}
    ${SDL_IMAGE_INCLUDE_DIR}
    ${SDL_TTF_INCLUDE_DIR}
)

include_directories("../../fonts")
include_directories("../../images")
include_directories("../../includes")

file(GLOB_RECURSE SOURCES "../../src/*.cpp")
file(GLOB_RECURSE INCLUDES "../../includes/*.hpp")

add_executable(${PROJECT_NAME} ${SOURCES} ${INCLUDES})

target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} ${SDL2_LIBRARY} ${SDL2_IMAGE_LIBRARY} ${SDL2_TTF_LIBRARY})
